abstract: Citigroup‘s chairman, Richard Parsons, spoke about the government’s stress tests and Wall Street’s future in a radio interview on Wednesday.
snippet: Citigroup‘s chairman, Richard Parsons, spoke about the government’s stress tests and Wall Street’s future in a radio interview on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Did Washington pull punches on the stress tests to appease the nation’s biggest banks? Some critics have suggested as much (not to mention “Saturday Night Live”), but Richard D. Parsons sees the behind-the-scenes haggling a bit differently.

headline.main: Citi Chairman on Stress Tests and Finance Jobs
